title: Sanctuary of Exile changes
text: - Below you will find changes and new features that were introduced in Sanctuary of Exile

title: Unique item drop changes
text: - Unique items ratio has been improved, meaning all unique items drop rate has been increased
- Additionally, bosses, champions, unique and super unique monsters have higher chance to drop a unique

title: Map currency - Glyphs information
text: - New map customization system has been introduced to Sanctuary of Exile. It allows the player to have more agency and adjust the level of rewards to the power level of your character
- Every map tier has an abstract modifier called `glyph weight` which is equal to the `tier` of the map:
- T1 has glyph weight of 1
- T2 has glyph weight of 2
- T3 has glyph weight of 3
-  T4 has glyph weight of 4
- Every glyph has the same weight, which is equal to 1
- Glyphs work only on `rare` maps
- Rerolling the map with `Infused Horadrim Orb` will remove the Glyph and won’t refund it
- Every glyph along its unique modifier adds % HP and % enhanced physical damage to monsters, which differs per map tier
- Increases monster HP by:
- 5% on T1 map
- 8% on T2 map
- 10% on T3 map
- 12% on T4 map
- Increases monster physical damage by:
- 0% on T1 map
- 5% on T2 map
- 8% on T3 map
- 12% on T4 map

title: Map currency - Glyphs modifiers
text: - Glyph of Nemeses:
- Adds additional `25% of unique monster packs` to the map - Stacks with itself
- Glyph of Corruption:
- Monsters have `25% chance to drop a corrupted item` - this mod stack with itself
- `Map boss drops additional 1-3 corrupted uniques` - this mod `DOES NOT` stack with itself
- Glyph of Adversaries:
- Adds `additional map boss` - this mod `DOES NOT` stack with itself
- Map boss drops additional skillers - this mod `DOES NOT` stack with itself
- Glyph of Moo:
- Adds additional Hell Bovines to the map - this mod `DOES NOT` stack with itself
- Known bug: applying this glyph to map more than once makes the cow not appear
- Glyph of Monstrous Lineage:
- Adds extra Reanimated Horde that grant additional experience on kill - this mod `DOES NOT` stack with itself

title: Map currency - Terrors information
text: - Terrors are a new endgame map currency that adds unusual and difficult monsters to a map. These monsters are biased towards some kind of loot, based on the type of Terror applied to a map
- Only one Terror can be applied to a map
- Terrors scale with map tiers - the rewards on T1 map are going to be worse than on higher tiers
- Terrors work only on `rare` maps
- Rerolling the map with `Infused Horadrim Orb` will remove the Glyph and won’t refund it
- Every glyph along its unique modifier adds % HP and % enhanced physical damage to monsters, which differs per map tier
- Increases monster HP by:
- 15% on T1 map
- 20% on T2 map
- 25% on T3 map
- 30% on T4 map
- Increases monster physical damage by:
- 10% on T1 map
- 15% on T2 map
- 20% on T3 map
- 25% on T4 map

title: Map currency - Terrors mods
text: - `Terror of Resplendence` - adds additional `Resplendent Horrors` which drop:
- Up to 2 unique items on a T1 Map
- Up to 3 unique items on a T2 Map
- Up to 4 unique items on a T3 Map
- Up to 5 unique items on a T4 Map
- `Terror of Opulence` - adds additional `Opulent Horrors` which drop:
- Up to 1 currency item on a T1 Map
- Up to 2 currency items on a T2 Map
- Up to 3 currency items on a T3 Map
- Up to 4 currency items on a T4 Map
- Can drop:
- Glyphs
- Chisels
- Mythic Orb
- Divine Orb
- Sacred Orb - low chance
- `Terror of Ethereal` - adds additional `Ethereal Horrors` which drop:
- Up to 1 rune on a T1 map
- Up to 2 runes on a T2 map
- Up to 3 runes on a T3 map
- Up to 4 runes on a T4 map

title: Map currency - Chisels information
text: - New map customization system has been introduced to Sanctuary of Exile. It allows the player to have more agency and adjust the level of rewards to the power level of your character
- Every map tier can have maximum of two chisels applied to it
- Rerolling the map with `Infused Horadrim Orb` will remove the Chisels and won’t refund it
- Every chisel along its unique modifier adds % HP and % enhanced physical damage to monsters, which differs per map tier
- Increases monster HP by:
- 5% on T1 map
- 8% on T2 map
- 10% on T3 map
- 12% on T4 map
- Increases monster physical damage by:
- 0% on T1 map
- 5% on T2 map
- 8% on T3 map
- 12% on T4 map

title: Map currency - Chisels mods
text: - Cartographer's Chisel (basic):
- Increases player `gold % magic find` by `25%`
- Increases `monster density` by `55%` on T1 map
- Increases `monster density` by `65%` on T2 map
- Increases `monster density` by `75%` on T3 map
- Increases `monster density` by `75%` on T4 map
- Cartographer's Chisel of Avarice:
- Increases player `gold % magic find` by `75%`
- Increases player `experience bonus` by `75%`
- Cartographer's Chisel of Procurement:
- Increases `monster density` by `85%` on T1 map
- Increases `monster density` by `95%` on T2 map
- Increases `monster density` by `105%` on T3 map
- Increases `monster density` by `105%` on T4 map

- `Anya` now sells basic `Cartographer's Chisel`
- Corrupting the map with `World Stone Shard` will now increase monster HP% and % physical damage
- Increases monster HP by:
- 5% on T1 map
- 8% on T2 map
- 10% on T3 map
- 12% on T4 map
- Increases monster physical damage by:
- 0% on T1 map
- 5% on T2 map
- 8% on T3 map
- 12% on T4 map

title: Ornate charms
text: - Ornate charms are horizontal 3x1 charms that drop only in maps
- Ornate charms can roll all of the affixes of Grand Charms
- Ornate charms have exclusive tier of affixes with higher values than obtainable on other charms
- Ornate charms can be re-rolled with the same Cube recipe as other charms
- Better affixes are available on Ornate Charms the higher the item level is
- Ornate charms code is `cm4`

title: Mythical Jewels
text: - Mythical jewels are a new tier of jewels that drop only in maps
- Mythical jewels can roll all of the affixes of regular jewels
- Mythical jewels have exclusive tier of affixes with higher values than obtainable on regular jewels
- Mythical jewels can be re-rolled with the same Cube recipe as regular jewels
- Better affixes are available on Mythical jewels the higher the item level is
- Please refer to [Mythical Jewel Cube Recipes](app:cube:mythical jewel recipes) for cube recipes
- Mythical Jewels code is `mjw`

title: Boots sockets
text: - Boots are now able to have sockets
- `Normal tier boots` can have up to 1 socket
- `Exceptional tier boots` can have up to 2 sockets
- `Elite tier boots` can have up to 3 sockets
- Socketable socketed in boots count as socketed in helmet/chest

title: Monster changes
text: - Unique non-boss monsters on Hell difficulty damage bonus coefficient increased from 66% to 80%
- Champion monsters damage bonus coefficient increased from 66% to 80%

title: Gambling changes
text: - Class bases are available in gambling
- More bases is available in gambling

title: Cube recipe changes
text: - Due to lower gems being sold by vendors, cubing from normal to flawless is no longer possible

title: NPC changes
text: - Akara now sells Token of Absolution for 1 gold. Finally we may rejoice!
- Due to technical reasons, the chipped, flawed and normal gems no longer drop and are sold by:
- Chipped are sold by Akara in Act 1
- Flawed are sold by Fara in Act 2
- Normal are sold by Akara in Act 3
